page.title: 03BRIMINGTON JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Brimington Junior School is{107}years old.It was built in{1878.}The number of children in the school are{260 approx, aged 7 to 11 years.There are 10 teachers and the head teacher Mr. Dunbar.We have a caretaker and cleaning ladies.Some of the subjects we do are maths,English,art and many others.We have four playtimes,two in the morning,lunchtime and one in the afternoon.There are fifteen rooms in school with toilets inside and out. The perimeter of the playground that surrounds the school is {233}metres. We have many out of school activities like computer clubs, discos ,rugby and many others. The school has a flourishing Parent- Friends and Teacher Association.
